releaseNotes:
Aurora Forecast 6.0.1

• The cloud layer on your map was stuck in the past. It now stays up to date — so you'll always know where the skies are clear for your next aurora.
• Fixed an issue where GPS location mode was not being tracked correctly.
• Improved translations across more languages.

Thank you for chasing the light with us. Every update brings us closer to the perfect aurora experience.
description:
Aurora Forecast is no longer just a data monitor — it's your intelligent personal aurora hunting guide.

Version 6.0.0 is our biggest update ever, deeply integrating Apple Intelligence and Apple Watch to make chasing the Northern Lights intuitive and magical.

— AI AURORA ANALYST (Apple Intelligence) —
Aurora forecasting means decoding solar wind speed, interplanetary magnetic fields, and Kp indices. Now you don't have to. Our AI Aurora Analyst, powered by Apple Intelligence, processes all of that and delivers a clear, personalized "Go/No-Go" verdict based on your exact location and local weather. One glance answers the only question that matters: "Can I see it tonight?"

— WIDGETS & APPLE WATCH COMPLICATIONS —
Never miss a geomagnetic storm. Home Screen and Lock Screen widgets deliver real-time Kp-index updates at a glance. New Apple Watch complications let you track activity right from your wrist — perfect for quick checks when you're already out in the field.

— CORE FEATURES —
• NOAA OVATION Aurora Forecast Model
• Real-time solar wind & geomagnetic activity data
• Interactive aurora probability map
• 3D globe with real-time aurora visualization
• Multi-day Kp-index forecast charts
• Customizable push notifications for geomagnetic storms
• Dark sky location finder
• Apple Watch app with complications
• 30+ languages supported

Whether you're a seasoned aurora chaser or hoping to see the Northern Lights for the first time, Aurora Forecast puts space weather science and Apple's native intelligence in your pocket.

—
Subscription Details

• Aurora Pro (Monthly): $2.99/month
• Aurora Pro (Yearly): $12.99/year
• Aurora Ultimate (Monthly): $4.99/month
• Aurora Ultimate (Yearly): $24.99/year

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tinacinc.com/AuroraForecast/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.tinacinc.com/AuroraForecast/terms_of_conditions.html
